General.Name: Micro-Star International Co Ltd
General.Description: Micro-Star International Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells motherboards, interface cards, notebook computers, and other electronic products in Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through Computer and Peripherals, and Other segments. Its products portfolio includes laptops, desktops, monitors, graphic cards, gaming gears, PC cases and components, liquid cooling, and power supply products, as well as backpacks and others; and peripherals comprising keyboards, mice, controllers, mouse pads, gaming chairs, and audio products. The company is also involved in the manufacturing, sale, support, after-sales service, and logistics service of computers and electronic components. Micro-Star International Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei city, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 69, Lide Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
